function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid spread of COVID-19 attributed to Chinese New Year, connecting flights, and rail connectivity.","Impact":"Increase in the number of infected people in destination cities, potential for widespread transmission.","Mitigation":"Implementing travel restrictions and quarantine measures, increasing awareness and timely action.","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, real-time monitoring systems, public health surveillance technologies.","People":"Travelers, population of destination cities, public health officials.","Owner":"Public health authorities, government, transportation agencies."},{"Description":"Association between frequency of air flights and high-speed rail services and number of infected people in destination cities.","Impact":"Increase in the risk of infection for travelers, potential for rapid spread of disease.","Mitigation":"Reducing frequency of flights and rail services, implementing strict hygiene and safety measures for travelers.","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring systems, disinfection technologies for transportation, crowd management systems.","People":"Travelers, population of destination cities, transportation officials.","Owner":"Transportation agencies, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Resilience of bike-sharing network compared to subway system during COVID-19.","Impact":"Shift in transportation behavior, potential for higher risk of exposure in crowded subway systems.","Mitigation":"Promoting alternative transport modes, improving sanitation and ventilation in subway systems.","Technologies":"Smart transportation apps, air purification systems, real-time occupancy monitoring for transportation.","People":"Riders, public transportation users, city officials.","Owner":"Transportation authorities, city government, public health officials."}]}
